title: Loved the Right Way
description: An Erotic RomanceFinding it difficult to get over her husband after an unforeseen and devastating break up, single life is turning out to be anything but simple for Adriana Stokes.If her life isn ºt difficult enough, now Adriana has to decide who is the one, if there really is a one. Is it the husband of 10 years, who left her without a why, now begging for another chance after his lies and secrets are exposed? Is it the blind date, now boyfriend who has told her the devastating secret of why he really started dating her, hoping that love is strong enough for her to forgive him? Is it her husbands best-friend, godfather to her son, who has been keeping her husbands secrets since college, praying that she would not let his friendship with her husband make the decision for her?
author: M.D.  Smith
